attributes.additional_details: I think that as this government has failed and the Prime Minister has now stood down its only fair that all parties have a crack at taking control picked by the public after a campaign to reassure the public about its best way forward and not with 'empty promises' if the public have spoken we should also decide who governs us 'properly'.
attributes.background: Since our government have been in power there has been false promise after false promise, they have made the lives of working families a misery aswell as that of people with disabilities, not only did they 'almost' lose Scotland in a referendum they have just LOST EUROPE putting our security at risk
